Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: There are many fun activities to do in NYC, including visiting museums, dining at various restaurants, attending Broadway shows, experiencing unique activities like roller skating at Rockefeller Center, and visiting landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Other activities include shopping at the world's largest Harry Potter Store, visiting the Museum of Broadway, and exploring Brooklyn Heights and the Promenade. The text provides various lists of fun activities to do in NYC, ranging from 36 to 94 activities.
